org.jruyi.io

Interface Codec.ICodecProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    Codec

    public static interface Codec.ICodecProvider
    ICodec provider. It is used to separate the implementation provider from the API module.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICodec<byte[]> byteArray()
      Returns a byte array codec.
      ICodec<java.nio.ByteBuffer> byteBuffer()
      Returns a ByteBuffer codec.
      ICodec<IByteSequence> byteSequence()
      Returns a byte sequence codec.
